title: This actor must be runned only from other actors

searchtext.title: Address or administrative area
searchtext.description: Address or administrative area as free text

radiusMeters.title: Search radius
radiusMeters.description: Radius from geocoded or custom coordinates, if 0 search is limited by approx 300km distance

proxy.title: Proxy configuration
proxy.description: A proxy server is required to run this actor! Either use an Apify residential proxy, or provide your own proxy servers. Datacenter proxies will not work.
proxy.sectionDescription: RESIDENTIAL proxy is required to run this actor! Datacenter proxies will not work.

maxRequestRetries.title: Max request retries
maxRequestRetries.description: Select how many times the page will be retried if the scraper is blocked or encounters other errors.
